turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Assistant, I'd like to order two pizzas from Domino's

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. I can do that. Do you mean the Domino's on 2nd?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I like that one

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What size pizzas did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make them two large pizzas please. I want pepperoni and pineapple on one, and the other can be a Deluxe

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. For these pizzas, did you want Brooklyn style or Hand-tossed crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's go for Hand-tossed on both of them

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Do you want to change the sauce or cheese from the default choices?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are they on right now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Right now both pizzas have normal tomato sauce and cheese

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What other kinds of sauce are there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You could get Hearty Marinara Sauce, BBQ Sauce, Garlic Parmesan White Sauce, or Alfredo Sauce

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm... let's go with Hearty Marinara Sauce and extra cheese on the pineapple and pepperoni pizza. Leave the Deluxe as is

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Did you want to add any other toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'm alright

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Did you want and dipping sauces for your pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do those cost anything?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes. They're 50 cents each

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Then no, I don't need any sides. I don't want any bread sticks or soda either

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. The total comes out to $40. Did you want to use your account to pay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yea, use my account. When can I pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The pizzas should be ready in about 25 minutes. I will text you the receipt

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Got it. Thank you, Assistant
